commandHelpReply:
This bot delivers notifications and private messages from Leela.Game.

When bot delivers you a private message or a comment - you can reply to it as you do it usually on Telegram: click on the message, choose "Reply", enter the reply text, click "Send". Your reply will get delivered to the corresponding chat on Leela.Game.
commandStartReply:
Now the bot can send you notifications.

To connect the bot to leela.game send the command /connect
connectToLeelaSceneEnter:
Enter the connection code located at
https://leela.game/settings/notifications
randomInputTextReply: If you want to reply, click on the desired message and select "Reply"
